mapper.select: select member.mId, user.nickname, user.picture, member.permission from member, user where gId = #{gId} and user.email = member.email and permission = 0
select member.mId, user.nickname, user.picture, member.permission from member, user where gId = #{gId} and user.email = member.email and (permission = 1 or permission = 2 or permission = 3)
mapper.insert: insert into a407.member (gId, email, nickname, permission) values (#{gId}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{permission})
